column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Vicky - Thank you for your kind words regarding our ramen
column2: although I must make a point of clarification: We don't take reservations at JINYA
column3: but seat guests on a first-come
column4: first-served basis. I hope that doesn't deter you from visiting us again. But if you do
column5: I hope we can provide you with the same dining experience as this one.
